loan.name: Sifa
loan.use: to increase her stock, such as foodstuffs and home products, to sell in her general store and to buy manure for her farm.
loan.description: Sifa, 36, is happily married and has been blessed with two children who are seven and four years old. She runs a general store and a mobile transaction business. At home, she also farms. Sifa would like to boost both her businesses and is kindly requesting a loan that will enable her to increase her in-store stock and buy farm inputs that will increase her yield. She is committed to repaying her loan using the profits she makes. Sifa's dream is to own a large wholesale shop and have a bright future.
loan.whySpecial: It gives financial access to low income micro-entrepreneurs.
